Your City Council
=================

Overview
--------

The City of Borger is a Home Rule City governed by a Council/Manager style of government. The citizens elect 5 council members at large to three-year staggered terms. Each May, the Council members then elect one of their own to serve as Mayor.

The Council appoints a City Manager to see to the day-to-day administration of the city. The City Manager appoints the City Secretary and City Attorney subject to the approval of the City Council.

Meetings
--------

* 1st Tuesday of each month @ 6:30 PM
* 3rd Tuesday of each month @ 1:30 PM

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

The official agenda for each meeting normally posts on the Friday afternoon prior to the scheduled meeting. Minutes are available following approval. Click the TV icon to view the live broadcast meetings or head to our Facebook videos, where every meeting is live broadcast.  
[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.borgertx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-Council-5)
